language.item: Please fill in all required fields.
Please maximize your browser for using this application.

Please complete this questionnaire. You will be asked to sort different statements that people have about Schiphol. Results will be used during the simulation gaming session on Thursday 31 August 2017.{br}{i}Maksims Kornevs{i}
Please enter your user code. Please note, that in this demo any user code will be accepted.{br}{br}{i}Tip: This is an optional step and you can deactivate it in your own survey.{i}
Connection to server failed. Please try again.

Read the following statements carefully and split them up into three piles: a pile for statements you tend to disagree with, a pile for statements you tend to agree with, and a pile for the rest.{br}{br}You can either drag the statements into one of the three piles or press 1, 2, 3 on your keyboard. Changes can be made later.{br}{br}If you want to read this instruction a second time, press the help-button at the bottom left corner.

Now please sort the stratements:{br}select 3 statements that you strongly disagree with (-2),{br}select 5 statements that you disagree with (-1),{br}select 9 statements that you neutral(0),{br}select 3 statements that you agree with (-1), and{br}select 3 statements that you strongly agree with (+2),{br}{br}{i}If text is too little to see, hold mouse over the text to see full text{i}

Now you have placed all cards on the score sheet. Please go over your distribution once more and shift cards if you want to.{br}{br}{i}Tip: This is an optional step and you can deactivate it in your own survey.{i}
Please explain why you agree most or disagree most with the following statements you have placed below "+2" or "-2".{br}{br}
Finally, please answer the following questions regarding your background.{br}{br}
